channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
so i have a few things i wanna fix with my shops.
#1 i want to change my donator shop from points to gp, which i added this code [code] if (c.myShopId == 69 ) { c.sendMessage("This item currently costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins.");[/code]
#2 my shops restock way to quick, how would slow this down, or even stop it from updating?

if (c.myShopId == 69 ) { c.sendMessage("This item currently costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins.");
